All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CommandLineParser
A utility class for parsing command-line arguments.
Cone
Represents a cone shape.
Cylinder
Represents a cylinder shape.
OctagonalPrism
Represents an octagonal prism shape.
PentagonalPrism
Represents a pentagonal prism shape.
Pyramid
Represents a pyramid shape with a square base.
Shape3D
Represents a 3D shape.
Shape3D.CompareType
Enum representing the types of criteria by which shapes can be compared.
ShapesReader
A utility class to read shape data from large files.
Sort
Sorts an array of 3D shapes based on user-specified criteria.
SortingUtility
A utility class that provides multiple sorting algorithms to sort arrays of Shape3D.
SquarePrism
Represents a square prism shape.
TriangularPrism
Represents a triangular prism with an equilateral triangle as its base.
